meanings.definition: A person who plays the bongos.
meanings.sent1: The talented bongoist entertained the crowd with rhythmic beats.
meanings.sent2: The bongoist performed at the music festival last night.
meanings.sent3: The bongoist drummed so energetically that even the birds joined in the rhythm.
meanings.sent4: Her hands moved like lightning as she played the bongos, a true bongoist.
meanings.sent5: The bongoist's passion for percussion was evident in every beat.

meanings.definition: A supporter or practitioner of bongo music.
meanings.sent1: As a dedicated bongoist, he attended every bongo concert in town.
meanings.sent2: The bongoist's collection of bongo music albums was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The bongoist proudly wore a t-shirt with a bongo drum print to the music event.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, she was known as the ultimate bongoist.
meanings.sent5: The bongoist's love for bongo music was contagious to everyone around.

meanings.definition: Someone who is skilled in playing the bongos.
meanings.sent1: The young bongoist practiced diligently to perfect his drumming skills.
meanings.sent2: She was recognized as the best bongoist in the music school.
meanings.sent3: The bongoist amazed the audience with a flawless bongo solo.
meanings.sent4: His hands moved with precision and speed, showcasing his talent as a bongoist.
meanings.sent5: The bongoist's rhythmic expertise was unmatched in the music industry.
